test.name: ETHEREUM MAINNET - INFURA WEBSOCKET BOT TASK : Monitor new pending transactions on the Ethereum Mainnet and log a list of transaction hashes from the Infura RPC URL.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Run
kw.msg: Running command 'wscat -c wss://mainnet.infura.io/ws/v3/ -x '{"jsonrpc":"2.0", "id": 1, "method": "eth_subscribe", "params": ["newPendingTransactions"]}' | jq .params.result | grep -v null > /tasks/logs/eth_subscribe_newPendingTransactions.json'.
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
